item.title: A story of trial and error trying to create a dynamic user group in Slack
item.description: This article is a December 6th article of [JSL \ (Japan System Giken \) Advent Calendar 2019 \- Qiita](https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2019/jsl).Lastyear'scalendaris[here!!](https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2018/jsl) TL;DR It seems useful to have dynamic user groups in Slack like @here Is it possible to use Slack’s usergroups.users.update API? It was possible after periodic execution using Chalice (Python) and AWS Lambda I was able to do it, but I quit because there was a problem Is it suitable for the purpose?
